/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is flanked by trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. In the distance, the iconic Temple of Heaven can be seen, adding a touch of historical significance to the urban landscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which enhances the grandeur of the temple and the expansive sky. The colors in the image are vivid, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
